description: Incredibles 2 (2018) follows the superhero Parr family as they balance family life with fighting crime. Helen leads a campaign to restore public trust in superheroes while Bob manages domestic challenges at home.
title: Incredibles 2

description: When 11-year-old girl named Riley as she navigates a move to a new city. It explores how Joy, Sadness, Anger, Fear, and Disgust work together to shape her experiences and memories.
title: Inside Out

description: Jamie Foxx leads an all-star cast in this hilarious, heart-filled adventure. After a near-death experience, he embarks on a journey through the afterlife and learns profound lessons about passion and purpose.
title: Soul

description: Moana sets sail on a daring mission to save her people. Along the way, she meets the mighty demigod Mauiâ€“together they cross the ocean on a fun-filled, action-packed voyage from Walt Disney Animation Studios.
title: Moana

description: In a realm known as Kumandra, a re-imagined Earth inhabited by an ancient civilization, a warrior named Raya is determined to find the last dragon
title: Raya and the Last Dragon
